original: assert (H : exists E : dio_single nat nat, dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν : nat -> nat, dio_single_pred E ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l))). { exists (dee2dp_1 l, dee2dp_2 l). split. - rewrite dee2dp_1_size, dee2dp_2_size. lia. - intros ν. split. + intros Hpred. apply dee2dp_spec. auto. + intros [φ Hfeval]. rewrite dee2dp_spec. easy. } apply H.
